original_text: And it came to pass, when the angel of the Lord spake these words unto all the children of Israel, that the people lifted up their voice, and wept.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 이스라엘 모든 자손에게 이 말씀을 이르매 백성이 소리를 높여 운지라

sentences.original_text: when the angel of the Lord spake these words
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 천사가 이 말씀을 말했을 때

sentences.original_text: unto all the children of Israel
that the people lifted up their voice
